name: Mr. Scarecrow's New Hat
description:
This game was created for the July 2022 Mooncord Gamejam, the theme was travesty so I decided to make a very bad platformer.

Mr. Scarecrow is VERY insecure about being bald and his current hat is falling apart. You are contractually obligated to help him find a new one. Direct Mr. Scarecrow by clicking and he'll platform for you. This fun new way of playing platformers is one you're sure to enjoy.
